Class Main

java.lang.Object
Main
public class Main extends Object
The main class declaration

This class executes a set of instructions that asks the user how they would like to manipulate the 'poisepms' database.

Version:
1.00 25 June 2024
Author:
Matthew-James Pether

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Loops through a menu that the console outputs which requires the user to enter a value. The input value determines the next set of instructions this class will be executing.
      if user selects: '1' = calls a method that inserts a new project, '2' = calls a method that searches a project, '3' = calls a method that displays unfinished projects, '4' = calls a method that displays overdue projects, '5' = calls a method that displays all projects, '0' = breaks the loop and outputs a message
      Parameters:
      queryNum - int variable that stores the menu option the user entered
      isLooping - boolean variable that loops through the code until user selects '0'
      scan - initiates the Scanner class to get the users input
      projectNum - int variable that stores the project number to search the project details
      currentDate - initiates the Date class to get the current date
      dateForma - initiates the SimpleDateFormat class which helps format the currentDate variable

    • searchOptions

      public static String searchOptions(Scanner scan, int projectNum)
      Displays a menu about what the user would like to do to the project he searched
      if user selects: '1' = calls a method to update the project '2' = deletes the project '3' = finalises the project '0' = breaks the loop
      Parameters:
      scan - initiates the Scanner class to get the users input
      projectNum - Stores the project number
      isLooping - boolean variable that loops through the code until user selects '0'
      isDelete - String variable that stores the users input (yes/no)
      deleteLoop - boolean variable that loops through the code until user selects '0'
      isFinalise - String variable that stores the users input (yes/no)
      finalLoop - boolean variable that loops through the code until user selects '0'
      date - String variable that stores the date the user inputs
      Returns:
      null
